title: US stocks trending downward as investors await Apple, Microsoft, Alphabet results
text: U.S. equity futures are trading lower ahead of the Tuesday trading session on Wall Street, a day when three tech titans – Apple, Microsoft, and Google parent Alphabet – will post quarterly results after the closing bell.

title: iPhone 13 release date: Apple's new flagship could be coming in September
text: Although we haven't heard any official news about the iPhone 13's release date yet, Apple's latest iPhone is rumored to come during a virtual event in the fall.

title: Apple (AAPL) Option Traders Enthusiastic Ahead of Earnings
text: A sizable amount of call options remain the open interest for AAPL and option premiums are unusually high right now.

title: Dow Jones Breaks 35,100 With Apple, Visa, Microsoft Earnings Coming
text: A third of the Dow Jones Industrial's companies are set to report earnings this week, including two tech heavyweights and a global payments giant.

title: Apple Stock Inches to New High as Street Weighs In Ahead of Tuesday's Earnings Report
text: The tech titan has warned that the top line could be clipped by component shortages, but hasn't provided any detailed guidance for the period.

title: Charged Up For A Blue Sky Run? How Apple Stock Looks Going Into Earnings
text: Apple Inc (NASDAQ:AAPL) is set to print its third-quarter 2021 earnings on Tuesday after market close and on Monday morning the stock was running up into the event, flirting with its July 15 all-time high of $150. Often when a stock runs up prior to its earnings print it results in a "sell the news" event.

title: Apple: Analysts eyeball US$3 trillion as they await Q2 earnings
text: It was less than two years ago that Apple Inc (NASDAQ:AAPL), the world's most valuable company, earned the distinction of becoming the world's first trillion dollar company. Back in autumn 2019 analysts wondered whether the tech giant could remain airborne at those levels.

title: Royal Wins integrates Apple Pay into latest version of the Kash Karnival Application
text: Royal Wins Corporation said its recently released version of the Kash Karnival 5.5.3 App will now include Apple Pay for iOS users.  Kash Karnival is Royal Wins' flagship hyper-casual gaming platform, in early July, the company unveiled its 5.5.3 release of the popular App.

title: 4 Stocks to Watch as Demand for Smartphones Makes a Comeback
text: Demand for smartphones is making a comeback in 2021 and sustain, aided by factors like 5G, making it wise to look at names like Jabil (JBL), Apple (AAPL), Micron (MU) and Qorvo (QRVO).

title: Exclusive first ride: Plus autonomous truck is a gentle giant on the highway

title: Apple Reports Earnings Tuesday. Why the Market Is Already Looking to What's Next.
text: The tech giant's stock surged to new all-time highs amid heightened investor anticipation of June-quarter earnings. The next iPhone might be the real difference-maker.
